Texts.Chs: 把^orange;EPP模块 (抗酸)^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Acid Shield Augment^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 也许有一天，我还会麻烦你这样的天才来帮助我，但是...我现在需要一个人思考一会儿，抱歉。
Texts.Eng: Perhaps one day I might call on your talents to help me with a little problem I am having...I'll need to consider.

Texts.Chs: 你可能苦恼于不知如何在不同的星球上生存。那么我就教你其中一种吧，你可以制造EPP模块 (抗酸)，这样你就能免疫硫酸啦，快去试试吧！
Texts.Eng: You're probably starting to have some issues surviving by now in different biomes. So let's get you building ^orange;augments^reset;! Show me an ^orange;Acid Shield augment^reset;  made by your own two hands!
